- Sex = good, go crazy with it. I rated this 18+ instead of GC, so no vore, scat, pedophilia, waterworks, guro, rape, etc...

- Light to Mild BDSM is permitted, but nothing heavy (i.e. bound, gagged, and blindfolded in a deep dark cell, no hope for escape, beaten with a rod and whipped until bleeding every night. Creates too much rape imagery, male or female).

- No OC's or self-inserts, you must stick to characters that exist within that universe. Feel free to create ridiculous scenarios or twist canon a bit to pair certain characters up, but try to avoid crossovers or anything involving the addition of characters not native to that universe. Just do something Super Smash Bros. related if you want epic Zelda x Samus expansion sexytimes.

- Even though the title is Nintendo Girl Expansion, guys are fair game as well, and you may do penis, muscle, etc... expansion for them as well. As with the girls, try to keep the expansion within some kind of limit.

- Violence and character death are permitted, but it should be in the context of an action/adventure tale and not for purposes of erotica.

- While not a hard rule, keep it in the realm of breast, butt, and/or hourglass expansion, and try not to make it absolutely ridiculous (i.e. the size of a house). I won't wildly delete things that I don't personally find appealing, but I want to keep this as a sort of semi-haven from the stomach-inflation, giantess, and muscle growth that I see everywhere else. Basically, these other things are technically allowed, but I'm encouraging you to stay with breast, butt, and/or hourglass expansion.

- Above all, Write for yourself and have fun.

With that, I'd say to dive in and start writing!
